name: Cassette Combat
description:
Cassette Combat is a real time twist on the roguelite deckbuilder where playing tapes performs your skills.

The new Cassette Combat figure BunBun has been released and you finally snagged one! Now it's time to get her out of the box and have playfights with all your older toys.

Tapes can be fast forwarded to perform their effects twice as fast but they also need to be rewound once they finish their run time. Tactically winning battles offers new tapes and upgrades to your stats. Can you beat the Crocodile Dentist after this toy gauntlet?

Created for the Super Rare Games Mixtape Gamejam.
